title: league clint freezing and no sound.
body: Every time I open the league clint it won't have sound but it will let me get all the way to the queue at that point when I try to start it just freezes and task manager shows that league is still there but not using any data.

replies.body: When you say freeze, where exactly is it happening and what do you see on your screen?  Is it when you hit accept or once you've entered champion select?  If so, do you have any third party programs running that interact with League?  These have been known to cause issues during champion select, so you'll want to disable them.  Let me know!
